titleStmt.title: The watch-man's voice, giving warning to all men of the dreadful day of the Lord, which he apprehends to be at hand that they may take a due care to save their souls and lives that they perish not therein, and that their blood may not be required at his hand / written by Digby Bull.
titleStmt.author: Bull, Digby.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author and are to be sold by J. Whitlock ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
